content: nataly scarf the pattern is available for free until 10 04 * needles 3 mm us2 ½ /uk11 2 needles or circular needles * yarn 75 % wool 25 % polyamide 50 g = 205 m 224 yd / 4 ply/fingering/sock yarn recommended yarn drops fabel needed 70 g 313 yd * gauge 24 sts x 32 row =10x 10cm/4 x 4 on * size 122 cm x 60 cm + 7cm +60 cm 48 03 in x 23 62 in + 2 75 in +23 62 in the scarf is a symmetrical triangle the first two edge stitches are knitted using the i-cord method as follows from the right side of the work pass 2 stitches with the yarn to the back from the wrong side of the work pass 2 stitches with the yarn to the front the edge stitches from the right and wrong side of the knitting are quickly transferred to the right needle to increase in every fourth row at the end of the work from the front we add one stitch yo in front of the last two stitches
